body:
Hi Pin, The issue is because something went wrong with a new function inside the component, it is called secant: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/MxiWRsRJtF3wmmketWOYL3Vt26VcBU1RL97d4FBFA5PdZjLPLE3HP1V9q2C-a-eNuDRb5RtifotVjxnP5fwI1OdP8*D9LJZ9/issue_.png) I have to talk to Chris about it. Best
Antonello
